text: The rest of the men there said nothing but you could see they were hard hit. They were simple men who knew a lot maybe about digging for but were babes in arms when it came to dealing with owlhooters and desperadoes like Pell and Fenton and the rest. "I guess we'd better hold onto the right 2hyar, Nick; said the Sodbuster .
